name: Dinari, Inc.
description: Operator of stock options and incentive management platform intended to provide direct exposure to stock plans and public trading. The company's platform offers a wide range of services from equity management and options grants to payroll compliance, taxes, and vesting schedules, enabling investors with direct exposure to the trusted asset with simple and easy incentive management
